FuncDef:
The suppress-flapping peer disable command disables OSPF neighbor relationship flapping suppression globally.
The undo suppress-flapping peer disable command enables OSPF neighbor relationship flapping suppression globally. The suppress-flapping peer disable command disables OSPF neighbor relationship flapping suppression globally. The undo suppress-flapping peer disable command enables OSPF neighbor relationship flapping suppression globally. By default, OSPF neighbor relationship flapping suppression is enabled globally.
